title: we know that DMG is pretty high this season but what about the movement speed ?
body:
TF MAINS 3 years ago would do anything for MS, thats why they played with MS quints.
now its feels like everyone having somehow MS from items\broken kit.
Riot did nerf all shield champions.
and now i think its the time to nerf MS from champions

Ekko-nerf
Jhin-super nerf
Phage item-Nerf
Fiora-Nerf
Garen- Nerf
Zoe-Nerf
Blitzcracnk W-Nef
Lulu bonus MS-Nerf
Janna passive-nerf
and there is more

replies.body: alot of the damage is caused by the movement speed. because of the celerity rune

> [{quoted}](name=JoeAnarchy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RQTMhnUl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-25T12:32:44.620+0000)
>
> alot of the damage is caused by the movement speed. because of the celerity rune

not really, celerity hardly gives 12 ad at 500 mov speed

Celerity is giving ~30 AD at the absolute most, and that's only if you're running Predator Quinn, which only lasts until you attack and break *both* ult and predator.

Sure, it gives damage, but only 100-150 damage at 16, which isn't that much compared to the health everyone has.
Riot took away Fioras movespeed before, it was absolutely awful to play as.

What the actual fuck?

a huge amount of champions from your list are like this since YEARS, why the fuck do you want to nerf them now?

no
just no
why does  {item:3095}}  affect ranged heroes as much as melees?  while {{item:3044}}  can't?
Tbh I don't understand the movement speed on Zoe after using a summoner spell, like it's just "here" it doesn't make sense thematically, neither related to her kit

Ekko- Has to get a 3 hit of his passive for movement speed and he is melee....
Jhin - Everyone agrees he needs his speed nerfed
Phage - is fine
Fiora - fine
Garen - If he did not have this he would never be able to do anything. nerf his damage a little if anything
Zoe - she has been nerfed enough 
Blitzcrank - also fine
Lulu - FINE
Janna - Fine
And no there is not more Jhin is the only one and that is really because of {{item:3095}}
